DataElement.preferredName: Corticosteroid Stable Lower Dose Administered Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to the administration of stable or decreasing dose of corticosteroids to the patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the administration of stable or decreasing dose of corticosteroids to the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).(NCI)

Concepts.definition: Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).

Property.preferredDefinition: Stable; subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.:To become lower, grow less, or diminish, as in amount, intensity, degree, or value.:The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.:Given.

Concepts.definition: Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.
To become lower, grow less, or diminish, as in amount, intensity, degree, or value.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The indicator whether an event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Existing in time or space without stop or interruption.

Concepts.definition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.

Concepts.definition: Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient been on a stable
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been on a stable or decreasing dose of corticosteroids for the indicated period

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been on a stable or decreasing dose of corticosteroids for 7 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been on a stable or decreasing dose of steroids for at least 1 week prior to registration?
